page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: {FARMING Crops used:barley,potatoes,turnips,rough+sow n grass,trout,game birds {LOCALS ATTITUDE TO FARMING Q.Is it good farming here? A.Yes,good Q.Is Glass a very profitable farming area? A.No,even some farms are selling out. {QUESTIONS ASKED AT FISH FARM { }Fish:salmon,sea,rainbow+brown trout Q.Does he fish farm do well? A. Average. Q. What customers are there? A. Just locals from Huntly,Elgin and Dufftown.Occasionaly some large orders Q.Does the owner have just one fish farm? A.Yes,he had one at Elgin before this.
